title: New: JONES – Melt
content:
With her debut album on the horizon, and featuring some of the most ambitious production credits of the year (we’re talking Justin Parker, Tourist, Rodaidh McDonald and more), the next few months are shaping up rather nicely for London’s JONES.

Her latest offering, Melt, is another slice of smooth, yet vaguely early 00’s sounding pop, and is sure to build anticipation for the October release of her LP. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
